categories.name: Necklaces

products.name: Royal Zulu Collar Necklace

products.name: Rainbow Pride Choker
products.description: Vibrant multi-colored choker necklace representing unity and celebration.

products.description: Bold geometric bracelet inspired by Zulu warrior traditions.

products.description: Elegant crescent moon earrings with dangling beads in silver and blue.
